text: Ezɨ Godɨn apangkuvir a pura anɨngizim, an Adam amizir arazir kuramɨn mɨn amir puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra, gumazir vamɨra Adam arazir kuram gamizɨ, tuavir kamɨn gumazamizir avɨriba ariaghire. Ezɨ gumazir vamɨra Krais Iesus an apangkuvimɨn, God e gamizɨ, e an damazimɨn dera. Ezɨ Godɨn apangkuvimɨn gavgavim bar ovevemɨn gavgavim gafira. Bizir kam, a gumazamizir avɨriba pura me ganɨngizɨ, a me gizɨfa!
